div.div: The Wheaton Area Schools will work together with our community to achieve excellence in academics and Co-curriculars, foster high student and staff morale, provide a safe environment for the success of all of our students, while remaining financially accountable.

I. Improve Math and Reading achievement at the Middle School Level to meet Annual Yearly Progress (AYP), as determined by the Minnesota Department of Education. II. Remain fiscally responsible to the community. III. Maintain and plan for District Facility projects to ensure our buildings remain positive learning environments. IV. Provide robust curriculum opportunities for secondary students in a variety of pathways. V. Provide Staff Development opportunities for technology integration in instruction.

div.p: We would like to welcome you to the Wheaton Area Schools website. We hope you find the website easy to navigate and that you enjoy its many different benefits and features. If you are having trouble finding items you are wanting and/or needing, please contact our office to ensure we... Read more →

article.class: post-403 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-whs-announcements

h4.a: School Board Meeting To Be Held On Zoom 4/13/20

div.p: Wheaton Area Schools Board Meeting, scheduled for Monday, April 13th at 6:00 p.m. will be held virtually, due to the Coronavirus COVID 19 Pandemic. To participate in the meeting, log in to the following Zoom meeting at 6:00 p.m. on Monday, April 13th. Please click on article heading above for details... Read more →

div.p: Wheaton Area Schools District is located in western Minnesota and borders both North Dakota and South Dakota. High expectations are established for all students. From our PreKindergarten program through our wide array of High School programs, Wheaton Area Schools offers a well-rounded curriculum for our students. We offer educational opportunities where every student is guided and encouraged to reach his or her full potential.
